messages.content: Write 3 concise bullets on why streaming responses are useful for UX.

outputs.text: {"provider": "KIMI", "model": "kimi-k2-0711-preview", "content": "- **Instant feedback**: Users see partial results immediately, reducing perceived wait time.  \n- **Progressive engagement**: Content starts usable before the full payload arrives, keeping attention.  \n- **Resilience to interruption**: Early output remains accessible even if the connection drops mid-stream.",
